SageTVPlugin.Name: Tuner Preroll
SageTVPlugin.Description: This plugin prerolls any Digital TV Tuner preventing recording errors when recording multiple tuners after SageTV has restarted.
SageTVPlugin.Author: routerunner
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes: 1.0.0 - First Public Release. 1.0.1 - Fixes some tuner doesn't return signal strength. 1.0.2 - New method, simpler, faster and more reliable. 1.0.3 - Improved compatibility with hybrid tuners.
